message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $20,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and potential.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $20,000 is already a significant discount on my end.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I understand your position, I am still unable to pay more than $10,000 for the product. I hope we can find a solution that respects my budget.
